item.title: HP 14s Laptop
item.dc:creator: Sunil
item.description:
• This laptop features 1 TB HDD + 256 GB SSD storage so that you can easily manage your files and more.
  • With 8 GB DDR4 memory, you can enjoy easy multitasking and seamless transition from one app to another. Expansive Viewing
  • Thanks to the two-sided narrow borders, you can enjoy an expansive view of the screen which will make your viewing experience a lot more enjoyable.
  • It features a slim border, an anti-glare FHD display that provides a bright and clear image that also takes care of your eyes.
  • And, with Dell Cinema, you can enjoy rich colour, sound, and streaming which will give you a cinematic experience at home.
  • It also features a lightweight construction.
item.content:encoded:
Key Features
  • HP 14s 3501 Core i5 11th Gen – (8 GB/1 TB HDD/256 GB SSD/Windows 10 Home)
  • Inspiron 3501 Laptop  (15.6 inch, Black, 1.83 kg, With MS Office)
  • Pre-installed Genuine Windows 10 OS
  • Preloaded with MS Office
  • Light Laptop without Optical Disk Drive
  • 15.6 inch Full HD LED Backlit Anti-glare Display

item.title: APPLE Watch Series 3
item.dc:creator: Sunil
item.description:
The Ultimate Sports Watch
Challenge yourself to explore new heights and keep track of your feats with the GPS and altimeter. Gruelling physical tasks are bearable when you have a backup of your favourite tracks saved on your watch. The Apple Watch Series 3 is also swimproof and can be worn in the pool or out in the ocean. Track the progress of your workouts, from casual jogs and intense cycle rides, to everything in between on your smartwatch.
item.content:encoded:
Key Features
  • APPLE Watch Series 3 GPS – 42 mm Space Grey Aluminium Case with Black Sport Band  (Black Strap, Regular)
  • GPS and Altimeter
  • Swimproof
  • Voice Based Siri
  • 3 Activity Rings Tracking – Move, Exercise, Stand
  • Smart Coaching
  • Activity Sharing and Achievements
  • Heart Rate Monitor
  • Breathe App
  • Notifications
  • Touchscreen
  • Notifier, Fitness & Outdoor
  • Battery Runtime: Upto 18 hr

item.title: DELL Inspiron
item.dc:creator: Sunil
item.description:
• This laptop features 1 TB HDD + 256 GB SSD storage so that you can easily manage your files and more.
  • With 8 GB DDR4 memory, you can enjoy easy multitasking and seamless transition from one app to another. Expansive Viewing
  • Thanks to the two-sided narrow borders, you can enjoy an expansive view of the screen which will make your viewing experience a lot more enjoyable.
  • It features a slim border, an anti-glare FHD display that provides a bright and clear image that also takes care of your eyes.
  • And, with Dell Cinema, you can enjoy rich colour, sound, and streaming which will give you a cinematic experience at home.
  • It also features a lightweight construction.
item.content:encoded:
Key Features

item.title: Sony Headphone with Mic
item.dc:creator: Sunil
item.description:
• 8 total microphones
  • Up to 10 m (33 ft) Bluetooth range, Codec SBC and AAC
  • Touch Controls: Volume, skip track, phone calls, customisable shortcut
  • Buttons: VPA (Google Assistant, Amazon Alexa), Bluetooth, Controllable Noise Cancelling
  • Amazon Alexa Voice-enabled VPA, Bose Music app, Siri Controls
  • USB-C on the headphone side, USB-A on the source side Input
  • 2.5-mm audio cable for the headphone side and a standard 3.5-mm jack for the device side
  • Bluetooth range of up to 9 metres and can pair with two devices at once
item.content:encoded:
Key Features
  • TriPort acoustic headphone structure
  • Including 11 settings that range from full noise cancelling
  • 6 microphones for Active Noise Cancelling (ANC)
  • 4 microphones for Voice Pickup (2 are shared with ANC)
